Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or needs. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $100. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
